verses.roman:
yei sūtre yei ṛk-viṣaya-vacana
bhāgavate sei ṛk śloke nibandhana

synonyms: yei sūtre—in the codes of Vedānta-sūtra; yei—whatever; ṛk—Vedic mantra; viṣaya-vacana—subject matter to be explained; bhāgavate—in Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; sei ṛk—that same Vedic mantra; śloke—in eighteen thousand verses; nibandhana—compiling.
translation: "In Vedānta-sūtra, the purpose of all Vedic knowledge is explained, and in Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam the same purpose has been explained in eighteen thousand verses.
